io.micronaut.security.oauth2.openid.configuration

Class OpenIdFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.security.oauth2.openid.configuration.OpenIdFactory

  • @Factory
public class OpenIdFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory which creates beans of type Creates a HTTP Declarative client to communicate with an OpenID connect Discovery endpoint. The discovery endpoint is declared by the property micronaut.security.oauth2.issuer
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Sergio del Amo
